key_points.text:
Bernstein Liebhard LLP Announces A Securities Fraud Class Action Lawsuit Has Been Filed Against Fiserv, Inc.
Negative Sentiment:
Rosen Law Firm reminds purchasers of FI common stock of the important September 22 lead plaintiff deadline in a securities fraud action.

FI Stock forecasts
Negative Sentiment:
Berger Montague PC notifies investors of a class action lawsuit against Fiserv, setting a lead plaintiff deadline of September 22, 2025.

Fiserv, Inc. Receives $207.08 Consensus PT from Analysts
Neutral Sentiment:
A new analyst report publishes updated forecasts for Fiserv’s revenue and earnings, outlining valuation metrics and long-term projections.
Bernstein Liebhard LLP announces a securities fraud class action has been filed against Fiserv on behalf of shareholders who bought stock between July 24, 2024 and July 22, 2025.
